listing.listing_description: Contemporary chic and an excellent location help to ensure a fine way stay in this premium Balgowlah Heights townhouse. Take in a fine view of nearby Sydney Harbour from the balcony, before returning to the elegantly-outfitted and furnished interiors. Boasting a shimmering pool, and premium touches like a freestanding bath plus games room; local restaurants and the city itself are close by.Located in one of Sydney's most historic suburbs, Balgowlah Villa provides everything and more for the small group seeking to both relax, and to experience Australia’s largest city. A refreshing morning swim, a stimulating coffee or juice on the airy balcony, or a fine breakfast on the sunny stone patio are options every day, while the ultra-modern and open plan kitchen ensures that whipping up meals is a treat. Relax for the evening in the sophistication of the softly-lit living room, or cross the herringbone floor to fix a delicious drink to savor in front of the glowing fireplace.This villa’s location is ideal for those looking for a peaceful base, but one with snappy access to the real attractions of Sydney. Visit a plethora of locally owned and operated cafes, restaurants and bars within a short walk of the home, with a selection of convenient playgrounds, parks and fascinating lookout points nearby, on the Dobroyd headland. Guests have excellent access to the quaint surrounds of sandy Clontarf Beach, while the bright lights of downtown itself are less than 25 minutes by car. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.The Palms is a four bedroom beachfront luxury villa located on a private island just off the coast of Fiji in the Pacific Ocean. Vomo Island Resort is the only resort on the eighty-seven hectare island property. Surrounded by pristine sandy beach, crystal clear water, and shady palm trees, Vomo Island Resort is paradise. And, it’s yours to explore.Vomo’s newest and largest villa, The Palms, is equipped with the most luxurious features imaginable. Four bedrooms, all with king beds, alfresco bathrooms, private terraces, and ocean views, are perfect for your family and friends. The shared spaces are the ultimate in open-air design. In fact, the line from indoors to outdoors merges so seamlessly, you may not even realize. The living room, dining area, and kitchen are combined in a spacious great room. The white vaulted ceiling and numerous openings keep it bright with natural sunlight, and full of fresh ocean breeze. Cozy designer furniture decorates the living area. Modern contemporary seating and a beautiful wood dining table, with space for eight, completes the dining area. And, high end appliances, sleek countertops and cabinetry, and a breakfast bar in the kitchen will encourage the aspiring chef in your group.Surrounding The Palms, luscious tropical gardens, palm trees, and your own private beachfront. Integrated into the superb natural environment, The Palms terrace is a thing of beauty itself. Numerous lounge and dining areas provide guests with multiple settings to socialize or find solitude. Features inside include, television, Wi-Fi, a sound system, air conditioning, butler service, and daily laundry.Take some time to explore the island and you will find The Reef Restaurant and a couple of beachfront bars where you can enjoy some local cuisine while you watch the sun set over the ocean. Spend an afternoon learning to snorkel, windsurf, or stand-up paddle boarding. Or, book a tee time at Vomo’s nine hole pitch and putt golf course, it’s a great way to explore the whole island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located on New Zealand’s South Island, Queenstown is famous for adventure tourism and world class skiing. With Coronet Peak and The Remarkables just minutes away, this luxury rental puts you right where the action is.With so many exciting activities, you’re bound to want some relaxation time. There’s no better place than a hot tub with a mountain view, or maybe a Kiwi style barbeque and a glass of wine to end a busy day. Inside Forty Two you’ll find formal dining for eight, a beautiful lounge with Sky TV and a fireplace, an office with a computer, a fully equipped kitchen and so much more.What makes Forty Two a unique vacation rental? Its ingredients: wood, stone, stainless steel, floor-to-ceiling windows, and contemporary modern architecture. Together these elements give the perfect urban ski chalet feel. Curl up on the couch beside a roaring log fire; gaze out over Lake Wakatipu and onto The Remarkables mountain range. Appreciating the nature and traditional style of this space is easy. Moving from the living room to the galley style kitchen is like stepping into the future. Top of the line appliances, a breakfast bar, and an amazing view make this luxury rental the perfect blend of contemporary functionality and comfort.All of the bedrooms at Forty Two have a spectacular view of the mountains, an ensuite bathroom, dual vanity, NetFlix, television, and walk-in closets. The master has a king bed and a bath tub, the second bedroom has a queen bed, the third has two twins and the study’s couch pulls out into a double as well.Aside from world class skiing, Queenstown has plenty of fun, interesting, and exhilarating tourist destinations just minutes away from your rental. Walk into town and explore local boutique shops, fine dining, and bustling nightlife. Try your luck at Skycity Casino or take a stroll through Queenstown’s botanical gardens. Whatever your mood Forty Two has all your vacation needs covered.

listing.listing_description: Combining countryside charm with seaside luxury, this hilltop villa is nestled amongst a rustling palm grove, serving as the perfect base for your stay in the Byron Bay area. Enjoy sweeping views of Australia’s easternmost tip, with private courtyard, pool and viewpoint terrace. Just a short drive from Byron Bay’s legendary beaches, guests can plan diverse outings in perfect comfort and seclusion.Possibilities are at the heart of this villa’s appeal. Double veranda doors lead from sumptuous guest bedrooms to a pristine plunge pool and tree-ringed courtyard, complete with sun loungers. A fantastic view of the countryside is never more than a few steps away, with plantation-style windows and sheltered overhang providing a perfect view of cane fields that gently roll down towards the Coral Sea. Alfresco dining spots and outdoor furniture ensure guests can make the very most of this unparalleled vista, as animals graze and crops sway in the distance. Inside, guests can enjoy the towering stone fireplace, step-in-showers, and tasteful furnishings that add the extra touch to each stay. Guests will appreciate the fully-furnished kitchen, breakfast bar and supplied barbecue, with catering and housekeeping all available for pre-booking. Total privacy is core to what Toraja Roja can offer, with a separate studio bedroom and hideaway-style loveseat providing extra intimacy amongst peaceful surroundings.From the vantage point of the villa, any kind of outing is possible. Guests will enjoy easy access to the Pacific Highway, and can plan trips to any of northern New South Wales’s charming towns, wildlife reserves and national parks - including the spectacular Minyan Falls. Similarly, guests can drop everything for a day on one of the region’s countless sun-kissed beaches, with renowned surfing, snorkeling, sailing, day-cruise and sea-sports activities all very close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to forests of Eucalyptus, tropical gardens, and rare birds at this eco-friendly villa on the outskirts of Noosa. You'll want to pack a pair of binoculars and a camera while you're exploring this property. When you're waiting for the birds to appear, sit back and enjoy the jets in the swim/spa hot tub. Ready to emerge from the forest? Sunshine Beach and downtown Noosa are 6 minutes away.Thanks to wall-length openings on parallel sides, this modern architectural home lets you feel the fresh breeze while you're at the kitchen bar or on the sofa by the fireplace. With furnished outdoor lounge areas on both sides of the warm-wood-floored great room, your dinner parties will know no boundaries. And, shuttered-windows in each bed and bathroom ensure you're never far from a great view.Start each day with an Espresso in the garden, then step into the walk-in pantry for breakfast ideas. When the rest of the gang is up, gather around the breakfast bar in the open concept kitchen for some bacon and eggs from Noosa Farmer's Market. Pick-up some fresh fish as well for a lunchtime barbeque. And, if you need to keep up with work, Wi-Fi and office space should help.Australia is a great place to try scuba diving, snorkeling, or surfing, especially on the Sunshine Coast. Charter a private yacht to explore the coast from another angle or see if you can catch your dinner at Noosa Fishing and Crab Adventures. If fishing doesn't work, 1 of Australia's most acclaimed chef's, Peter Kuruvita, serves delicious dishes made from local ingredients at Noosa Beach House. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Read or nap under the leaves of the namesake tree at Poinciana House. Fully renovated, this mid-century-inspired bungalow uses iconic furnishings for personality and bold colors for an invitingly playful feel. Spend the day at Noosa’s Main Beach or national park, both a short walk or drive from the villa, then make dinner reservations at one of several restaurants only a minute away on foot. A poinciana tree stands in a corner of the villa’s private backyard, which also features a pool, a sunny deck with plenty of loungers, a gas barbecue and al-fresco dining for 8. Cue up your favorite shows on the Apple TV or post photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi. For grown-ups, there’s a Nespresso machine; for the littlest family members, there’s a high chair. Poinciana House stands out for its colorful accents and thoughtful design. The heart of the house is an open-concept great room with glass walls punctuated by bright blue doors, where there’s plenty of room to reconnect on a generous sectional, around a dining table with Wishbone chairs or at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. Stretch out on the built-in sofa in the separate library for a quiet moment—or to savor the luxury of a nap. This vacation rental has one bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and 2 bedrooms that share a bathroom: one with 2 king single beds and one with a queen bed. If you’ve brought the whole gang to Australia, there’s also a children’s room with a twin bunk bed, 2 separate twin beds and an en-suite bathroom. Take the kayak, paddleboard, surfboards and bodyboards out and make the most of the surf and sand on the famed beaches of Noosa Heads—three of which are less than a 10-minute drive away. The house is also only an 8-minute drive from the surf break at Noosa National Park. Walk into town for a family dinner, or leave older kids and relive your honeymoon over a little fine dining. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Join Australia’s sailing elite in the prestigious Palm Beach neighborhood at this Italian-inspired home on Pittwater’s coast. Watch as sailboats navigate the scenic waterways from the upper-balcony. Sip your morning coffee while dangling your feet off the end of the private dock. Then, work on your tan 5 minutes away on the sandy shores of Whale Beach. You might even spot one. Featured in Vogue Living, Gaelforce is one of Pittwater’s most sought-after rental properties. Split across 4 levels, including a boathouse and scenic treehouse, there’s plenty of unique areas to discover, and views to capture. Follow the multi-leveled wood-deck terrace to find smaller enclaves, spaces for group gatherings, and access to the water. Inside, captivating works of art and designer furnishings are sure to spark conversation. On quiet nights in, watch a movie with the family on Smart TV or have a casual barbecue and relax by the pool. If you’re in the mood to host, turn up the sound system, mix a few cocktails at the wet bar, and mingle with friends as you explore the terrace walkways and dock seating area. For some time alone with that special someone, the Treehouse’s private balcony is a romantic setting with an inspiring bay view. The Palm Beach neighborhood has no shortage of pristine beachfront. Within a 10-minute drive, you’ll find yourself enjoying morning swims and moonlit strolls on some of Australia’s most desirable beaches. Another great way to get a lay of the land is on the scenic fairways of Palm Beach Golf Club. And, if you long for city life, downtown Sydney is just 42-kilometers south. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get into the aloha spirit by way of Bali at Pakui Street Home. This three-bedroom Big Island vacation rental was designed with influences from around the Pacific Rim in mind—and even has views over the golf course to the Pacific itself. Its location close to the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort and Kona town give you easy access to beaches, shopping, dining and more.The home opens to a lush private backyard with a solar-heated pool, spa, hammock and gas barbecue, as well as a spacious lanai with sitting and dining areas. For your entertainment, there’s Apple TV, Wi-Fi access and a stereo system; for your convenience, there are also laundry facilities.Pakui Street Home pairs classic Hawaiian style with Balinese-influenced art and architecture to stunning effect. Two slide-away glass walls connect the lanai to the open-concept great room, where a vaulted ceiling lends a breezy feel to the living area, a dining area and a well-equipped kitchen. An office nook just off the kitchen is a quiet spot to catch up on emails to friends and family at home.The three bedrooms at this luxury property can accommodate groups of up to six—or can be reserved for one couple on a Hawaiian honeymoon. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with an alfresco shower, and one bedroom with two twin-over-double bunk beds. All three bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.Villa guests can opt in to resort privileges at the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort, giving you access to the sports, tennis and kids clubs, golf course, beach and pool services, and more during your holiday. Take the provided golf carts to the resort or, if you’d like to see more of the island, make the 15-minute drive to Waikoloa Beach Resort or the 20-minute drive to the town of Kona.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID#: 013-121-7408-01

listing.listing_description: Villa Malaathina is located off a quiet lane in the rural community of Umalas in Bali, known for its beautiful rice paddies and traditional way of life. The villa’s extravagant size, excellent facilities and carefully considered layout make it an ideal choice for families and friends holidaying together as well as an excellent venue for special events and celebrations. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Lusciously landscaped and serenely situated, there is much to enjoy here. From fabulous indoor and outdoor spaces to relax and first-class entertainment facilities, Villa Malaathina has you covered. Spend lazy days on a lounger next to the pristine swimming pool. Practice your sun salutations in the dedicated yoga studio. Work out at the impressively equipped gym. Or gather with friends at the end of the day and enjoy a meal cooked by your personal chef in the enormous poolside Teppanyaki pavilion.The grand, air conditioned library offers wonderful respite from the heat and is a great venue for informal catch-ups over a coffee or an afternoon of sport on the big screen. The home cinema features a fabulous 62-inch television and loads of comfortable sofas. Indoor and outdoor dining areas cater for casual suppers, formal dinners and long lunches. Sip on a cocktail or enjoy an ice-cold beer, and watch one of Bali’s spectacular sunsets from one of the four bar areas – your favorite cocktail in hand!Seven spacious bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at Villa Malaathina. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, and the master suite offers a rooftop terrace. Getting to the outdoors is a breeze, with direct access to a terrace, balcony or garden in all but one suite. All the while, a team of professional and caring staff will ensure that your holiday goes smoothly.Despite its charming rustic feel, the restaurants, bars and shopping of Seminyak are just a fifteen minute drive away from Villa Malaathina. The nearest surfing beaches are Batu Bolong and Berawa Beach. Other options for activities include the low-key seaside restaurants and cafes of Echo Beach, the stunning heritage Hotel Tugu, the award-winning Greg Norman-designed Nirwana Bali Golf Course and the dramatic sea temple at Tanah Lot. The splendors of this exclusive area of Indonesia await!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make an award-winning residence the setting for a memorable holiday at Racquet Retreat. Tucked between the Noosa riverfront, a sandy beach and a jetty opposite the national park, this Queensland vacation rental boasts a one-of-a-kind location—and its modern architecture only adds to its charms.Step past the walls of this estate and into what feels like your own private resort. Outside, there’s a boat dock on the river, a swimming pool, a hot tub, gas barbecue, and lounging and dining areas for you to enjoy, as well as a tennis court, as the villa’s name suggests. Inside, a home theater, bar area, pool table, streaming TV and Wi-Fi make entertaining and relaxing equally simple.Fold-away glass walls perfectly frame the river views from the villa’s open-concept great room. The free-flowing space gets a cool, gallery-like vibe from its all-white color scheme and sculptural furnishings that’s balanced by the warmth of its wood accents. An inviting sitting area, dining table for ten and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar provide plenty of space to enjoy the company of friends and family.This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds, en-suite bathrooms and balconies, including the master suite. There are also two sets of two bedrooms each with a king bed in one, two twin bunk beds in the other and a shared Jack and Jill style bathroom, perfect for parents traveling with younger children.Though it’s known for its surfing, Noosa is also a wonderful area for other water sports and sunny family getaways. Racquet Retreat is only a 4-minute drive from Noosa Head Main Beach, whose relatively calm waters are ideal for children or beginner surfers, and a 10-minute drive or less from a choice of several other beaches. When you’re done laying on the sand or playing in the surf, it’s a 5-minute drive to everything from casual cafés and boutiques to honeymoon-worthy waterfront dinners in downtown Noosa Heads.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Refresh both body and spirit at Ke Ea Ola (Kauna'oa 1A). Named for the Hawaiian words meaning “breath of life,” this exclusive Big Island vacation rental is close to thrilling activities from snorkeling to boogie boarding, and has soul-stirring ocean and sunset views. Its location in the gated neighborhood of Kauna’oa means guests have access to the amenities of both the Mauna Kea Beach Hotel and the Hapuna Prince Hotel.Guests of Ke Ea Ola (Kauna'oa 1A) are welcome at the shared Kauna’oa facilities, from the infinity pool and hot tub to the fitness center and three-hole golf practice course. To relax or entertain in private, simply step out to the villa’s backyard, which has lush tropical landscaping, a pool with waterfall feature and hot tub, and covered lanais with sitting and dining areas and a barbecue. Play a favorite album over the state-of-the-art sound system, or simply let the waves be the soundtrack to your holiday.The villa’s newly renovated interiors embody modern island luxury, and more than 3,100 square feet of living space over two stories make this townhouse feel like a stand-alone home. Vaulted ceilings and pocket doors that open to the terrace keep the great room bright and airy, while finishes in warm mango and mahogany lend a welcoming vibe. The tuxedo-style sectional and round dining table are contemporary yet comfortable, and the fully equipped kitchen includes a convenient breakfast bar and wine fridge.There are two bedrooms with king beds, two with two twin beds and three-and-a-half baths. Wood furnishings and trim and large windows or fold-away doors to the lanais give the bedrooms the same sunny, inviting appeal as the great room. In the bathrooms, you’ll find thoughtful details such as sizeable vanities and glassed-in showers.With its postcard-perfect scenery and wealth of activities, the Big Island is an ideal destination for a fun-filled family vacation or warm-weather honeymoon. And guests of Ke Ea Ola are in the middle of it, with a beach just a short walk or golf cart ride away that’s great for swimming, snorkeling and sunbathing. Borrow kayaks and other water sports equipment from the resorts, book a catamaran cruise or paddleboard expedition or enjoy exclusive use of a country club that’s just for Kauna’oa owners and guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: 055-314-1248-01

listing.listing_description: This superb four-bedroom suite is located within the Park Lane Residential Resort and Spa at Ala Moana, one of the finest luxury destinations on Oahu. The spacious modern residence includes beautiful living and dining areas both indoors and alfresco, high-end features for cooking and entertainment, and a private home office. Additionally, your vacation rental gives you access to the Park Lane's communal amenities, including the spa, swimming pool, movie theater, gym, and conference center. A gorgeous king master suite and three queen guestrooms make it an ideal choice for families, business travelers, and groups of friends up to eight in size.The villa's design blends modernism and naturalism into a quintessential Waikiki style: neutral-toned surfaces harmonize with fine wood floors, superb light-fixtures, and lovely touches of vibrant color in the artwork and fabrics. The luminous, open-concept interior includes an ample salon with large TV, a dining table for eight, and a chef-grade kitchen with breakfast bar. Glass doors open to a spacious lanai with alfresco dining, an outstanding barbeque grilling station, and expansive views of the lush shoreline and azure ocean.The villa’s master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, and large ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and tub. All three queen bedrooms features ensuite bathrooms (two with showers, one with shower and tub). One of these rooms is essentially a junior master suite, with a walk-in closet and deluxe bathroom with tub. There is a safe and TV in each bedroom and air conditioning throughout the villa.Park Lane offers the consummate Oahu experience, balancing wellness, style, and natural beauty within minutes of both Waikiki and Honolulu. The resort boasts a world-class spa, a lovely pool and hot tub, and other high-end amenities for guests of all ages, along with a network of seaside paths adorned with superb artwork. Several enchanting beaches are minutes from your door, and you're about four miles from the sublime vistas at Diamond Head. With Honolulu International Airport just seven miles away, this vacation rental is ideal for destination wedding guests and easy weekend escapes.Please note: A 30-night minimum is requiredCopyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.GE/TA#183-057-8176-01.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to the old Oahu world of John Walker. A Scotsman who made his way to Hawaii as a young man in the 1870s, he become the contractor of choice for Queen Liliuokalani. Walker erected such notable buildings as the Bishop Museum and Honolulu Hale, or City Hall. John Walker’s inviting and innovative presence is felt in the structure of this Beach House, his favorite hideaway on Lanikai Beach.The Main House at this seaside property features three bedrooms, a kitchen and a large great room with spacious accommodations for large gatherings. Steps away are the soft white sands of Lanikai Beach with access to the water right from the front lawn of Walker’s Lanikai Beach House. With a separate entry, the Guest Cottage located off the courtyard features a queen room and a small parlor with kitchenette, sleeping up to four. Another private entry boathouse sits above the garage, complete with its own living room, kitchen, bathroom and lanai. The boathouse also has a loft area with double bed that maybe used for young children, sleeping up to four.The enchanting environment at Walker’s Lanikai Beach House transports you back to an era of graceful living, where the worries of the world are lost in the quiet lapping of the sea, the glistening of the sand and the sublimely restful surroundings. Enjoy the fully equipped kitchen, guest quarters and boat house, with elements of charm carefully preserved from a richly felt past. In the kitchen, enjoy stainless steel appliances, marble countertops and a breakfast bar—an exceptional environment for the culinary genius in your entourage.Five delightful bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at Walker’s Lanikai Beach House. Step into the master suite with a king bed, ensuite bathroom, television and air conditioning. Framed by the turquoise waters that are below eye-level, you will feel as if you are floating on the pristine waters of the Pacific as you fall sound asleep.One of the first homes to take advantage of Lanikai’s heavenly, reef-protected waters and natural stretch of white sand, John Walker’s Lanikai Beach House set the standard by which the surrounding community grew. With such glorious beach surroundings you can enjoy surfing, snorkeling, golfing and relaxing in the therapeutic Hawaiian sun. Walker’s is a quintessential Lanikai Beach House. If you are seeking a casual, relaxing getaway on the shores of one of the world’s best beaches, you’ve found it!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Lic#W-87402697-01Non-Conforming Use Permit Number 90/TVU-0042

listing.listing_description: Discover just how remarkable eco-friendly luxury can be at Mahu Whenua. This South Island vacation rental, whose name translates to “healing the land,” is set on 55,000 hectares of former sheep station in the shadow of the mountains that make up Mount Aspiring National Park. Now, this expanse of land is devoted to plant-regeneration and native-bird-breeding programs—and to being a private escape for you.Your holiday at Mahu Whenua includes the services of a chef, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as a pre-dinner drink and canapés each day. If you’re visiting in the summer, soak in the sunshine from the swimming pool or al-fresco lounge area; in cooler weather, soak in the outdoor hot tub, cozy up by the outdoor fireplace or head inside to enjoy the Apple TV, surround-sound system, pool table and Wi-Fi.Amid the spectacular hills and valleys, forests and rivers is, happily, a cozy main house. Here, you can reconnect with friends and family under the vaulted ceiling of the living area, beneath the skylights of the dining room, or across the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.There are two bedrooms in the estate’s main house, two in two guest cottages and one bunk room. All four bedrooms have king beds and en-suite bathrooms; the bunk room has one twin bunk bed, one twin-over-double bunk bed and a shared hall bathroom. The guest cottages have fully equipped kitchenettes and their own terraces, making them ideal for couples wanting honeymoon-style privacy.This extraordinary retreat is only a 20-minute drive from Wanaka, the gateway to Mount Aspiring National Park. It’s also a 90-minute drive or a 10-minute helicopter flight from Queenstown. In the summer, you can immerse yourself in the scenery at local attractions such as the Wanaka Lavender Farm; in the winter, skiing is close at hand.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find a lush and lovely Bali home in Villa Inti. Set just outside central Canggu, close to Pererenan Beach, this vacation rental is a quiet, private place to relax with friends and family. Inviting outdoor spaces, beautifully designed interiors and five bedrooms make it a wonderful retreat for up to ten guests.Savor the gorgeous weather from outdoor living areas with a pool, living and dining areas, plenty of loungers and a barbecue. After the sun sets, look to the media room, smart TV, sound system and Wi-Fi for entertainment. Your holiday at Villa Inti also includes the services of a villa manager, housekeeper and guard.From the classic balé, or gazebo, to the vaulted ceiling that soars over the great room, Villa Inti exudes oft-imitated Balinese style. Its laid-back appeal is evident in the thatched roof, open-sided living and dining rooms, and the richly detailed wood furnishings that fill the space. There’s also a fully equipped kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances.Each of the villa’s five bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom. Several of the bedrooms open to the pool area or a shared terrace, and, for your comfort on the warmest tropical nights, all five have air conditioning and ceiling fans.Villa Inti is just a short drive from hip downtown Canggu, where you can dine on fresh, local fare, take a yoga or surf class, or browse crafts in the market. The closest beach is Pererenan, known for its break, but it’s not much farther to other popular beaches from Batu Bolong and Batubelig to Petitenget. For high-end boutiques and a range of restaurants, make the drive into chic downtown Seminyak; for ever-lively nightlife, there’s the resort area of Kuta. Guests who prefer teeing off to hanging ten will appreciate the nearby Nirwana Bali golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exceptional villa is located on the Byron Bay Shoreline south of Brisbane, within walking distance of Belongil Beach and Byron Bay town. Part of Kokos Beach Houses, the home is superbly appointed with high-end amenities for relaxation and dining, including a heated swimming pool, excellent media features, and a gourmet kitchen. The villa's style balances a classic beach vibe with modern luxury enhancements, offering a fresh and comfortable haven for families, groups of friends, or business travelers. Four ample bedrooms with flexible bedding arrangements accommodate up to eight guests in total comfort.The ample, fenced-in yard and entertainment area invite you to long days and evenings in the open air. Dip into the sparkling swimming pool and sunbathe on elegant lounge chairs. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, fire up the barbeque grill and relish an alfresco meal. Then linger outdoors in the enchanting night, sipping Australian wine under the stars.The main living room features vanishing walls on two sides, creating a graceful, indoor/outdoor space infused with an alfresco ambiance. The open-concept interior features a comfortable TV lounge, a dining table for eight, and a fully equipped kitchen with generous prep space. Central air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable in all seasons.The bedrooms are airy yet cozy, with lovely timber accents and neutral color palettes that evoke a classic beachfront serenity. The master and primary guest suites open to balconies and feature queen beds and ensuite bathrooms. The other two guestrooms feature pairs of twin beds (which can be arranged as kings if desired) and share a bathroom and comfortable TV room.From this private retreat, you're within easy walking distance of Belongil Beach, Byron Main Beach, and downtown Byron Bay. The sublime natural beauty of New South Wales is on full display at Arakwal National Park and Cape Byron State Conservation Area, both five minutes away by car. Golfers are about thirty kilometers to Teven Valley.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steal away in style at Mooloolaba. This water-view vacation rental on Australia’s Mooloolah River is a beautifully designed haven whose spectacular architecture rivals the scenery outside. Reserve its three bedrooms for a beach getaway with family or friends, or book the whole luxury property for a chic honeymoon-esque escape.Your holiday at Mooloolaba begins with a welcome basket, delivered in person upon your arrival. Should you need assistance (or inspiration) during your stay, a concierge is on call. While you’re at the villa, you can enjoy outdoor living areas with a plunge pool, gas barbecue, firepit and a dining table for six, as well as indoor amenities from an Apple TV and projector screen to a Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.The Mooloolaba experience starts when you enter gardens planted with fig and tipuana trees, and continues in dramatic fashion once you’re inside. An eight-meter glass wall separates the open-plan great room from the terrace, letting you create one seamless indoor-outdoor living space. The sitting area is defined by its curved sunken sectional; in the dining area and fully equipped kitchen, textures of tallow wood, onyx and polished concrete make a chic statement.The villa has two bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed and al-fresco bathtub and shower, and one with a queen bed. The third bedroom has a queen bed and access to a hallway bathroom.Mooloolaba is a 2-minute walk from the white sands of Mooloolaba Spit Beach, and a short drive from two other beaches. By car, it’s less than 10 minutes to downtown Mooloolaba; shopping, dining and activities on The Wharf; and the Headland Golf Club. For a day trip, plan to head to the downtown of nearby Sunshine Coast or explore Mooloolah River National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Keep warm in the hot tub while you gaze upon the snow-covered peaks of Mt. Aspiring at this modern mountain home, just off Lake Wanaka. Slide open the terrace doors and invite the fresh breeze, fragrant gardens, and warm New Zealand sun to flow through. Spend a romantic evening by the fireplace while the kids play upstairs in the TV lounge or head out to explore Wanaka's town centre.Westland’s barn-style roof hints at the rugged nature of the Lake Wanaka area, yet underneath, stylish design sets a modern, luxurious tone. Craft delicious meals in the state of the kitchen. Celebrate as a family at the formal dining table with mountain views providing the background. After dinner, sneak away for a glass of local wine in the outdoor lounge as the sun sets behind the imposing mountains.Start your day bright and early with an espresso on the terrace. Then, whip up some bacon and eggs for the gang to enjoy in Westland’s cozy breakfast nook. Throw a log in the fireplace and catch up on reading while the kids play on the lawn. For lunch, grab something fresh from the local market in Wanaka and fire up the grill. Then head out to the trails for an afternoon hike along the lakeside. Rent some mountain bikes, pack a lunch, and make sure to bring your camera. Deans Bank, Rob Roy Glacier, and Roys Peak are all great hiking/biking trails to discover. If you’d rather explore the water, try fly fishing at Aspiring Fly Fishing guides or go jet-boating on the Matukituki River. When you’re ready to return to civilization, Queenstown is just an hour south.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb luxury home enjoys a private estate within Mauna Kea Resort on the Big Island of Hawaii, with access to a wonderful array of resort and beach club amenities. Perched at a slight elevation amid lush gardens and palm trees, the villa gazes out on sweeping views of the Pacific Ocean and the famous sunsets of the Kohala Coast. Ample outdoor living areas include a swimming pool and hot tub, while the beautifully furnished interiors feature a full bar, gourmet kitchen, and ocean-view dining table. A fabulous master bedroom suite plus two superb guestrooms (one with a king bed, one with two twins) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.The villa's pool terrace and lanai invite you to savor the open-air pleasures of this famous Hawaiian coastline. Bask in the sunlight on comfortable lounge chairs and dip into the sparkling pool. Relish alfresco meals while gazing at the vast panorama, and linger outdoors amid the enchanting nighttime lighting, crawling into the hot tub for a soothing soak under the stars.Wide thresholds join the terrace and the interior living areas, allowing the home to breathe the ocean air. The open-concept space includes a comfortable sunken lounge, a lovely bar, a table for games or drinks, and a dining table for eight with clear views of the ocean. The open kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and generous prep space. The house also includes excellent media features, a security system, and central air conditioning.The master suite opens directly to the pool terrace and enjoys beautiful ocean views. Its ensuite bathroom includes a jetted bathtub set within a luminous niche. The other two bedrooms share a bathroom between them. Outdoor sitting areas, air conditioning, ceiling fans, and TVs create cozy private havens for all guests.The villa is situated within minutes of world-class amenities at Mauna Kea Resort and Hapuna Beach Resort, including spas, swimming pools, tennis courts, and wonderful watersport options. Several world-class golf courses are within easy reach by car, and you're about twelve miles from Waimea.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-149-935-0016-01

listing.listing_description: The rolling hills of Australia get a classic-Hawaiian twist at this breezy villa in Fernleigh. Tap into the vintage vibes and let this mini-resort-like estate take you to new levels of relaxation. Spend star-lit evenings laid back in the hot tub. Sip wine in the terrace lounge while the kids toast marshmallows around the fire pit. In the morning, start your day with a walk along Broken Head Beach. Arrive in style on Luana Estate's helipad. After you've touched down, take a minute to explore Luana's collection of Hawaiian artifacts and vintage photography. Navigate your way around warm wood interiors, wall-length openings to the terrace, and dozens of scenic viewpoints. The open-plan kitchen's island and bench make a perfect social setting, even when preparing meals. Keep up with up your fitness routine on Launa's private tennis court, in the lap pool, or challenge a friend to a game of ping pong. Then, get your group's best griller to fire up the barbecue for lunch; there are gas and charcoal options. After lunch, grab a local craft brew and see if you can find some rugby on the Smart TV or keep up with any work in the office space. After a morning on the beach, shift your focus inland and head out on a bushwalk through the trails of Broken Head Nature Reserve, or, get the lay of the land while you work out your swing on Teven Valley Golf Course. For dinner and nightlife, Ballina and Byron Bay are both within a twenty-minute drive. If you really want to cut loose, head for the theme parks on the Gold Coast. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. Discover the ultimate South Pacific retreat at The BeacHouse. This spectacular oceanfront vacation rental is fronted by swaying palms and a white-sand beach—and it’s surrounded by the 225 acres of private island in Fiji’s Mamanuca chain that make up the Vomo Island Resort. It’s the perfect destination for a romantic getaway, a celebration with friends or a tropical wedding, and one of the only family-friendly private islands in the region.Your holiday on Vomo Island includes all meals and certain beverages, butler service, and the use of watersports equipment, a gym, tennis courts and more. Borrow a stand-up paddleboard and glide across the water, or put on snorkeling gear to slip beneath the surface. The BeacHouse also has its own outdoor living areas with sitting and dining areas, a pool, a boma with a wood-burning oven and barbecue, and plenty of loungers in both sun and shade.Taking inspiration from mid-century style, the villa is modern and sophisticated both inside and out. Stretch out on luxury handcrafted Dedon furniture on the decks or on the sleek sectional in the open-concept great room to the sounds of a favorite album on the Bose sound system. The space opens to the deck through a nearly wall-to-wall sliding glass door, so the warm breeze wafts over the sitting area to the fully equipped kitchen.The three bedrooms at The BeacHouse are linked to the main living areas by airy passages, and rival any honeymoon suite with their king beds, en-suite bathrooms with al-fresco showers, lounge areas, private terrace access and ocean views.With only one resort on Vomo Island, guests are welcome to roam the white-sand beaches, palm groves and hills. Join the daily guided snorkeling excursion and learn what lives in Fiji’s warm, clear waters, or glimpse Fijian culture at the manager’s cocktail hour on Thursday evenings. For a truly private island experience, book a day on neighboring Vomo Lailai. Resort staff will whisk you over with a picnic, a supply of champagne and a radio to call the boat back when you’re ready to return.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Revel in beautiful design and even more beautiful views at 5A Stevens. This modern townhouse has a gorgeously open feel and, with its three bedrooms, space for up to six family members or a group of friends. Its rooms overlook the Queensland coast and the ocean beyond, and its location puts you less than a 5-minute walk from the center of Sunshine Beach.Soak in the area’s namesake sunshine and take in the ocean views from private outdoor areas with a plunge pool, loungers, barbecue and al-fresco dining for six. For evening entertainment, the house has a media room with a TV and Bose speaker, as well as Wi-Fi; there’s also air conditioning and laundry facilities.Inside, fold-away glass walls frame the vistas of the water. Leave them closed on cool or windy days, or open them to create one seamless indoor-outdoor living space, where the terrace flows into the open-concept living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen. The media room is separate, so kids can watch TV while the grown-ups enjoy the luxury of uninterrupted conversation.This well-appointed vacation rental has one bedroom with a king bed, one bedroom with a queen bed, and one bedroom with two king single beds, which are slightly larger than twin beds. The king and queen bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, while the king single bedroom has access to a hall bathroom.A holiday at 5A Stevens means you’re only a 4-minute walk from Sunshine Beach, where you can start the day with a coffee at an oceanfront café, lounge on the sand or try surfing in the waves, and finish the evening with a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a restaurant overlooking the water. It’s also a short drive to several other beaches, plus Noosa National Park and two golf courses.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend a relaxed family holiday in one of the world’s finest resort communities at Kauna’oa 7B at Mauna Kea Resort. This Big Island vacation rental is part of the Kauna’oa private community, a 52-acre haven on Kauna’oa Bay with a country club, its own practice golf course and convenient beach access. It’s the perfect destination for groups of up to eight.This luxury townhouse is tucked into its own lush garden with a serene waterfall feature, heated pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. Guests are also welcome at the shared infinity pool, hot tub and fitness center at the Kauna’oa Country Club. After a day on the fairways or at the beach, pour a glass from the villa’s wine fridge and settle in by the cable TV and Wi-Fi.Enjoy seamless indoor-outdoor living thanks to slide-away pocket doors that separate the villa’s great room from the lanai. Feel the warm breezes and watch the ocean in the distance from the open-concept living area, dining table for eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances.Kauna’oa 7B has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom with honeymoon-suite-inspired details such as a jetted tub and al-fresco shower. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two double beds, respectively. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.The villa is only a 5-minute walk from Hapuna Beach and a 10- to 12-minute walk from the Mauna Kea Beach and Westin Hapuna Beach hotels, where membership privileges are available to give you access to the beach loungers, towel service, watersports equipment and more. And with four beaches and golf courses within a 10-mile drive, it’s easy to experience some of the best Hawaii has to offer.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: T-183-492-1984-01STVR-19-355866

listing.listing_description: This three-bedroom suite is located within the Park Lane Ala Moana on the South Shore of Oahu, just a short walk from the beach and minutes from downtown Waikiki and Honolulu. Guests enjoy access to the Park Lane's resort amenities, while the private residence offers an ample and comfortable home base with high-end appliances and beautiful views of the coastline and ocean. Three bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms provide ideal accommodations for families and groups of friends seeking stylish privacy, abundant activities, and a prime location along Hawaii's most iconic shore.The contemporary suite was designed by ODADA and Philpotts, and features over 2,500 of indoor and outdoor living space. The private lanai invites you to savor the Pacific views and breeze, while pocket doors allow an enchanting flow of air throughout the open-concept interior. The high-end kitchen and alfresco grill will meet your culinary needs, and the dining table for eight inspires memorable meals illuminated by large, ocean-view windows. At night, gather in the main lounge to watch your favorite shows or merely bathe in the gentle breeze over homemade cocktails.The ocean-view master bedroom features two double beds, a walk-in closet, a desk, and an ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, stand-alone shower, and tub. The two guestrooms both include king beds and ensuite bathrooms, and one has an ocean view as well. All of the bedrooms have air conditioining and TVs.Beyond your private abode, the Park Lane offers extraordinary resort amenities, from its large terrace with pool and hot tub to its well-equipped fitness center and spa. Two barbecue cabanas welcome open-air parties, while the private chef dining room, lounge, and bar room are excellent for special events. Business groups have access to a conference room.From the Park Lane, you're a ten-minute walk to the beach at Ala Moana Regional Park, and less than two miles to downtown Honolulu and Waikiki. Diamond Head Crater is less than five miles away, and golfers are an easy drive to Royal Hawaii Golf Club. Just seven miles to Honolulu International Airport, this vacation rental is a convenient choice for destination wedding guests and easy weekend escapes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA 203-898-9824-01The property will be made exclusively available to the renter for a full period of 30-days and no one else may occupy the property during that period. listing.listing_description: See Hawaii in a new light at Park Lane Palm Rez. This Honolulu vacation rental is part of the exclusive new Park Lane community near the Ala Moana shopping center, whose custom floor plans were designed to offer expansive ocean views. Reserve its sophisticated interiors and two bedrooms for a family holiday or a stylish Oahu honeymoon.Your stay at Park Lane includes 24-hour concierge and valet service, as well as access to the community’s shared pool, hot tub, fitness center, movie theater and spa. Book one of the two barbecue cabanas for an evening’s entertainment, or treat yourself in the private chef dining room. The villa also has its own lanai with sitting and dining areas and a barbecue.Designed by ODADA and Philpotts and Associates, the residence exudes modern tropical style across its more than 1,900 square feet of living space. Floor-to-ceiling glass floods the open-concept great room with island sunshine, and a sliding door lets you open the sitting and dining areas and fully equipped kitchen to the lanai. A separate den is a spot to steal a quiet moment with a book.The master suite at this luxury property has a king bed and ensuite bathroom, and the second bedroom has two twin beds and a shared hall bathroom. Should extra accommodations be needed, there’s also a sofa bed in the den.From Park Lane, it’s a 10-minute walk to the half-mile stretch of golden beach at Ala Moana Park. Browse at the nearby Ala Moana Shopping Center, or find more choices along the Waikiki stretch or in downtown Honolulu, both less than 2 miles away. Don’t miss the chance to catch a wave—or just a little sun—on legendary Waikiki Beach, about 3 miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. listing.listing_description: The broad flanks and snow-capped peaks of The Remarkables are doubled in the glassy surface of Lake Hayes—and again in the glass front of this sharply designed Queenstown retreat. Built into the slope down to the water and covered in windows, the villa opens new panoramas on each of its 3 levels. Get close to the scenery on the walking trail around the lake, or drive to golf and skiing.Alfresco sitting and dining areas give you the luxury of having a morning coffee or an evening glass of New Zealand wine within earshot of the lake lapping at the shore. If you’ve come for a ski holiday, end the day with a session in the outdoor hot tub instead, then cozy up to the fireplace to keep toes toasty.The heart of this vacation rental is an open-concept great room with a wall of windows that runs parallel to the lake and mountains, inviting the outdoors in. Wood-paneled ceilings and an ochre sectional bring natural texture and color into the decor, and on the practical side, there’s plenty of seating at the dining table for 8 and a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.A stay at this villa makes it easy to go for a walk around the lake, try the cafes in the charming town center of Allentown, a former mining hub, and tee off at nearby golf courses. It’s also within day-trip distance of Queenstown and skiing at Coronet Peak and The Remarkables.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Rangy mountains loom in the distance and rolling hills nestle this sleek architectural masterpiece on New Zealand’s North Island. Designed by Brendon Gordon Architecture and rendered in natural timber and stone, this streamlined villa seems like both part of the landscape and a respite from it. While it feels secluded, it’s only a 4-minute drive to a beach, café, and more in the town of Kinloch.Stay a while on a sunny terrace with alfresco dining for 8 and a barbecue, or set off on the provided bicycles and explore the area. If you’ve been out on the trails or the golf course all day, pour a glass from the wine fridge and settle in for the evening by a smart TV with satellite and streaming capabilities, a Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi.A great room lined in wall-to-wall, floor-to-ceiling glass creates the illusion of being immersed in the landscape, and sliding panels give you the luxury of opening the space to the outdoors. Cozy up on the pair of sofas in the sitting area, gather around a dining table for 8, or catch up with friends and family while perched at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the 4 bedrooms at this vacation rental has a king bed, private ensuite bathroom, and direct access to a terrace. Three of the bedrooms have golf-course views; the fourth looks out over the garden.A holiday at this villa is a honeymoon from the everyday—a chance to appreciate some of the country’s most dramatic scenery. Start in Kinloch, a 4-minute drive away, where you can spend a day on the beach or set off on mountain-biking trails around Lake Taupo. On the lake itself, you can try out fly fishing or book a sightseeing boat cruise. If you’re eager to tee off, ask about playing on the neighboring Kinloch Club Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Kambala enjoys an elevated location in the upscale neighborhood of Bellevue Hill, east of downtown Sydney, with expansive views of the city and harbor. Elegant and spacious interiors feature stylish décor and state-of-the-art amenities for cooking and entertainment, while ample alfresco living areas include a swimming pool. With four bedrooms sleeping eight, along with a baby-friendly nursery, the villa is an ideal vacation rental for families and groups of friends who desire a fine balance of privacy and convenience near the heart of Australia's most iconic city.The villa's yard and pool area invite you to long hours under the Pacific sun and stars. The lush lawn is ideal for reading a favorite book and sipping afternoon refreshments, while the glassed-in pool invites you to soothing dips. A covered lanai with spacious lounge is perfect for afternoon cocktails.Tall French doors open from the yard to the villa's open-concept interior, where a fully equipped kitchen serves a twelve-person dining table and bright lounge. Luminous white finishes and hardwood floors accentuate the exquisite light, while fine artwork adds touches of chic elegance. Beside the main living area, a comfy den with TV opens to the lawn and lanai.The villa's bedrooms are furnished with graceful simplicity and a palette of white and soothing gray, providing serene sanctuary for all guests. The master suite features a king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone tub and shower, while the primary guest room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. The other two rooms-one with twin bed, one with double-share a bathroom. The crib in the nursery can be replaced by a twin bed for extra guests.The villa's location offers an excellent blend of privacy and convenience, with Plumer Road Shopping Village within walking distance or a quick drive, and numerous downtown destinations within minutes of your door, including the Royal Botanic Gardens and Sydney Opera House. The beaches at Bondi, Coogee, and Tamarama are all a short drive away, as are Woollahra Golf Club and The Royal Sydney Golf Club. With Sydney Airport less than twelve kilometers away, Kambala is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pops of yellow echo the sunshine at this otherwise-restrained contemporary beach house just 5 minutes from the ocean. The living spaces are upstairs—all the better to look out at the Coral Sea—but there’s a pool and outdoor entertaining areas on the ground floor, too. It’s a short walk to Sunshine Beach Park, which is lined with shops and cafes for when you need a break from swimming and surfing.When you’re not at the beach, swim in the villa’s heated pool, whip up lunch and dinner with the help of the gas barbecue and al-fresco kitchen, and sit down with a glass of Australian wine at one of two outdoor dining areas. After dark, gather around the smart TV or share holiday snapshots with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi.Pass through the can’t-miss-it yellow door and up the sleek black metal staircase to reach the villa’s second-floor great room, where a slide-away glass wall opens to one of the outdoor dining areas and ocean views. Simplicity is king, whether in the lines of the mid-century-inspired sofa, the Lucite dining chairs, or the flat-fronted cabinets in the fully equipped kitchen.This vacation rental has two bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. Two other bedrooms—one with a queen bed and one with two king single beds—share a hall bathroom. If you’ve brought the whole clan on holiday, there’s also a children’s room with four king single bunk beds and access to a hall bathroom.A stay at Blueys Beach House gives you the luxury of walking 5 minutes from the Sunrise Beach location to Sunshine Beach Park or driving 10 minutes to Hastings Street in downtown Noosa, where you’ll find amazing espresso, one-of-a-kind gifts, and honeymoon-worthy dining. There are several other beaches within a 15-minute drive, plus two golf courses.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: When you arrive at Wailea Sunset Estate and pass through glass doors etched with Hawaiian scenes, you’ll know your dreams of paradise are about to come true. This truly magnificent four-bedroom home sits right up against the turquoise waters of the Pacific Ocean, presenting stunning views of the surrounding islands. The only thing separating you from your private stretch of beach is a lush green lawn and a swinging hammock.Spend tranquil days on the sun-kissed terrace, soaking up the island’s most famous feature. Cool down with a plunge in the pool then rinse off under the outdoor shower. Launch a kayak or snorkel right off the foot of your property. Light the barbecue and sizzle fresh surf ‘n’ turf for lunch and serve it around the al fresco dining table. The upstairs deck is the perfect spot to retreat with a book. Host a garden party on the front lawn or, on quieter nights, ease into the hot tub and watch an unforgettable Maui sunset.Inside, traditional Polynesian materials adorn the home, adding warmth and authenticity. Wicker panels line the ceiling while elegant furnishings are made from native wood. Sliding glass walls allow light and air to pour into the great room, where you can sink into a soft sofa or prepare gourmet meals on high-end appliances in the chef-appointed kitchen. The living room houses an immense 3D television and state-of-the-art home theater system in a custom-made entertainment cabinet. A tasting room gives connoisseurs a venue to test their palate.The villa has four breathtaking bedrooms also decorated with traditional dark wood furniture and paneled ceilings. The rooms are spacious and comfortable and each contains quality linens, entertainment unit, and a well-appointed en-suite bathroom. All open directly onto a deck or lanai. The Master bedroom has a King size bed and comfortable armchairs facing an HD flatscreen, plus a ocean-view deck.When you’re ready to explore, start by spending time on each of Wailea’s five white sand beaches. Surfers can catch waves North, in Kihei or Lahaina, while golfers will find 54-holes of championship golf just a mile away at the Wailea Golf Club. It’s a quick, five-minute drive to shops and restaurants, and one should not miss out on tours of Maui’s spectacular natural world.Hawaii Tax ID: TA-017-753-4976-01Permit #: Hotel ZonedCopyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: European sophistication is tucked behind leafy hedges at this single-story home in the sought-after Melbourne suburb of Malvern. Rooms lined with oak floors and marble counters look out over a wrought-iron patio table that wouldn’t be out of place at a bistro in Provence, along with a spa-worthy plunge pool. It’s less than 10 minutes to a playground and the coffee shops in downtown Toorak. Your holiday at this luxury property begins with a personal welcome and a gourmet basket, and a concierge is on call throughout your stay. On sunny days, lie out on a lounger by the plunge pool or pick up fresh produce at the market to prep on the gas barbecue and serve at the alfresco table for 6. On cooler evenings, a media room, Apple TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi, and a fireplace will help you cozy up. This vacation rental is laid out along one central great room whose open-plan layout and whitewashed, vaulted ceiling give it an airy feel. The fireplace divides a sitting area with three inviting sofas from a dining area for 8 and a marble-splashed, fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The villa has 2 bedrooms with private ensuite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other 2 bedrooms share access to a hall bathroom and have a double bed and 2 twin beds, respectively. If you’ve brought the whole family to Australia, it’s an easy walk or quick drive to the playground at nearby Menzies Reserve and the picnic-friendly lawns of the Malvern Public Gardens. Drive into the nearby town of Toorak for a quick coffee, a tempting browse through its boutiques, or a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a local brasserie or steakhouse. It’s also an easy day trip to the museums of central Melbourne or sandy St Kilda Beach. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Climb into a hammock and sway with the sea breeze at this beach house in Hawaii’s beautiful Waikoloa Beach Resort. Cool off on a hot afternoon in the refreshing swimming pool. At night, move over to the lagoon-style hot tub and melt all your stress away. The next morning, walk 2-minutes to Anaeho’omalu Bay and stroll along the sand while you plan out an exciting day on the Big Island.Warm, earthy tones, intricate wood features, and lush gardens show off Hawaii’s style at Hale Kolea Kai. Stretch out in a sun lounger to work on your tan. Find a shady spot beneath a palm tree to do a little reading. Or, hang out inside and enjoy the air conditioning in this modern beach house. If you’re in the mood to embrace the Hawaiian culture, fire up the barbecue, and mix up a few tropical drinks for an unforgettable evening.Take the kids to Kolea Amenity Center children’s pool, which features a sand bottom and a waterfall. While they’re splashing around in the pool, relax in the natural lava rock hot tub. After, stop for lunch or do a little shopping in the resort’s entertainment area. If you feel like exploring the island, the Hawai’i Volcanoes National Park is the perfect place to snap a few vacation photos.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #TA-099-593-5232-01

listing.listing_description: This architectural gem is nestled on the shores of Lake Wakatipu, on the South Island of New Zealand, close to the ski resorts at Coronet Peak and The Remarkables. The modernist design maximizes the villa's privileged position, with breathtaking mountain views in virtually every living area and bedroom, expansive outdoor spaces (including a superb rooftop terrace), and a beautiful water feature inspired by Frank Lloyd Wright's Fallingwater house. Exceptional amenities for wellness and relaxation include a sauna, outdoor hot tub, gym, and two gourmet kitchens (indoor and outdoor). Air conditioning, heating, a home office, and an elevator create a comfortable environment for guests of all ages. The four bedrooms at Cascata—all with outdoor living areas—accommodate families and groups of friends up to eight in size.Multiple outdoor living spaces invite you to savor the alpine air and spectacular views. On the main level, the open-concept living and dining area open to a lake-facing terrace and an alfresco dining patio, featuring a barbeque grill, rustic pizza oven, cocktail lounge, and table for twelve beneath a pergola. The hot tub is perched on the ground floor, while the extraordinary roof terrace features a lounge, with panoramic views encompassing Cecil Peak, The Remarkables, Kelvin Heights Golf Course, and the lake.Wall-to-wall glass doors infuse the interiors with natural light and lake-fresh breezes. The beautifully furnished lounge with high-end entertainment system flows gracefully into the dining area, where the open kitchen features chef-grade appliances and a wide breakfast bar. The villa also includes a superb home office and gym (both with inspiring views), as well as a cozy home theater. A cutting-edge LED lighting system evokes an enchanting ambiance at night.The master suite features a king bed, private balcony with breathtaking views, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, open shower, and lovely soaking tub. The second and third bedrooms share a balcony between them, as well as a deluxe bathroom. The fourth room, with king bed, opens to a terrace and shares a bathroom with the gym.Beyond this lakeside sanctuary, you're just three kilometers from SKYCITY Queenstown Casino, and within easy reach of Wakatipu Yacht Club, Queenstown Golf Course, and some of the finest skiing and hiking in New Zealand.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Magazine-worthy rooms overlook windswept coast at this designer villa just 40 minutes west of Auckland. Woven rugs and warm-toned woods give the newly remodeled interiors a welcoming vibe, and bay doors link them with outdoor areas surrounded by rugged hills. And once you’ve grabbed your gear, it’s only a 6-minute drive to Muriwai Golf Links and the surf break at Muriwai Beach. Muriwai Estate sits on 16 private acres, centered around a garden designed by award-winning landscape architect Mark Read and a furnished terrace that stretches the width of the house. Follow the slopes up to a saltwater swimming pool and hot tub, and let kids romp on the play structure while grown-ups tend the barbecue and firepit. Though the villa’s open-concept living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen take their cues from the New Zealand landscape—think woven area rugs, stone and wood accents, and natural tones—there are also plenty of surprises. Look up from a conversation with friends or family at the playful red cords on the dining-room chandelier, and examine the bird-print wallpaper that lines the powder room. This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms in the main house: 2 with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one with a queen bed and hall bathroom. There’s also a honeymoon-worthy suite in the pool house with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, fireplace, and wet bar. For larger parties, the main house also has a spare room with 2 queen beds and a children’s room with a twin bunk bed. Though it feels secluded, the villa’s location gives you the luxury of heading to the beach in the morning and coming back home for lunch. It’s only 6 minutes to the black sand and surf break of Muriwai Beach, plus Muriwai Golf Links. And no holiday here would be complete without a visit to the gannet colony, which you can reach on scenic clifftop trails. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Surf the waves of Byron Bay and return on foot to poolside relaxation and barbecue meals on the veranda. Modeled after Mediterranean island beach houses, this family-friendly villa near Clarkes Beach balances contemporary comforts with a bright, rustic simplicity in harmony with the landscape of Australia’s easternmost coast. The famed coffee shops and eateries of Byron Bay Town are within easy walking distance, and several of the region’s finest beaches are within 5 minutes of your door. Broad sunbeds and parasols surround the swimming pool on the ground level, with an ample grass yard for games or casual cocktail parties. The upper floor features the main living areas, with a spacious interior and gourmet kitchen opening to a wide, covered balcony with views of the bay. The bedrooms are spread out on both levels, including a small bunk room upstairs and a large bunk room downstairs. The downstairs level also features a media room with ping-pong table opening to the yard and pool.The prime location in Byron Bay places you within minutes of some of the finest dining, nightlife, and natural splendors in New South Wales. Walk about 3 minutes into town for coffee or dinner, enjoy a surfing lesson at Clarkes Beach, and look for humpback whales traversing the shimmering expanse. Drive about 6 minutes to Byron Bay Lighthouse and set off for a day hike on Cape Byron Walking Track. Experience the region’s pristine, otherworldly beauty at Arakwal National Park. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the heart of Seminyak, one of Bali’s most lively and cosmopolitan centers, is a massive urban luxury villa like no other, dubbed Eshara Estate. Tucked away in an inconspicuous and quiet lane, Eshara Estate provides eight large bedrooms in three separate villas for hosting larger groups of friends or families. This modern villa has been treated with traditional Balinese patterns and colors so as to remain wholly ensconced in the natural charms of this magical island.Each of Eshara Estate’s three villas have private gardens and swimming pools, separated by an ingenious system of retracting garden walls. Guests of the estate will also benefit from the dedicated service of a full staff including a butler, chef, housekeeper and three night watchmen. Guests can indulge in the estate’s total home entertainment systems or Wi-Fi, or take the party outside on the terrace complete with loungers. Enjoy fantastic meals at the alfresco dining area!Owing to the ‘three-in-one’ nature of the estate, there are individual great rooms found in each villa, complete with clear living, dining and kitchen areas. The furnishings are incredibly fun and unique including stylish cowhide seating. Crystal chandeliers illuminate the great rooms, and the walls feature brightly colored works of art. The home is replete with stone-carved statues of Balinese goddesses as well as a variety of Indonesian antiques and artifacts.Each villa offers master and junior suites, and each suite has a full en-suite bathrooms for maximum privacy. The bedrooms have been adorned with fantastic spiritual icons, wonderfully alluring local patterns and plenty of amenities to make guests feel right at home. Master suites additionally boast sensuous alfresco bathrooms, not to mention a convenient and direct entrance to the central pool.Not only is there so much to see and do in Seminyak, but it is also close to many other sites and attractions on this relatively small island. It’s only a half hour drive to the Elephant Safari Park in Taro, where one can gaze upon these deeply revered creatures in their natural habitat. Even closer is the cultural capital of Ubud, full of museums, traditional dances and exotic sights. Get the vacation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. Choose your own adventure at The Residence. Whether you’ve come for a romantic getaway, a family holiday or to mark a special occasion with friends, this lavish vacation rental, part of Vomo Island Resort, delivers an experience you’ll remember for a lifetime. Forget about the everyday and let the warm Fijian waters, white sands and friendly staff on this luxury private island pamper you.Your stay on Vomo Island includes all meals and non-alcoholic beverages, butler service, and the use of sailboats, kayaks, stand-up paddleboards, a gym, tennis courts and more. The Residence itself is tucked into lush tropical gardens right on the island’s Yasawa beach, and has its own outdoor living and dining areas with a pool, barbecue and plenty of loungers facing the brilliant blue water.The villa’s dreamy modern interiors are spread out over three pavilions for guests’ privacy and comfort. Lofty ceilings, wood paneling and sleek furnishings feel both breezy and sophisticated. In the main pavilion, living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen have space for everyone to share stories about the day’s snorkeling, tennis matches or spa treatments, or to simply unwind in front of the TV and share photos via Wi-Fi.All four bedrooms at The Residence have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, their own lounge areas and ocean views, and open to private terraces. Details like wood paneling and mid-century-inspired furnishings are warm and welcoming, while wall-to-wall sliding glass doors showcase the incredible scenery.With only one resort on Vomo Island, guests are free to explore the 225 acres ringed by white-sand beaches and clear, relatively calm waters. Join the daily guided snorkeling expedition, take kids to make new friends at the children’s center, and get a glimpse into traditional Fijian culture at the manager’s cocktail event on Thursday evenings. If the private island isn’t quite secluded enough, book a honeymoon-worthy day on the uninhabited neighboring island of Vomo Lailai, where resort staff will leave you with a picnic, ample champagne and a radio to call the boat back.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hit the beach with ease from this minimalistic townhouse on Australia’s Sunshine Coast in Noosa Heads. Work on your tan, cool off in the plunge pool or catch up on some reading, all while enjoying views of Sunshine Beach from the lower balcony. Wake up early to watch the sunrise from the east-facing balcony above. Then, stroll to Sunshine Beach, 4-minutes away or venture inland to downtown Noosa.Celebrate your trip to Australia with an elegant family dinner in the formal dining area or fire up the grill outside and keep it casual. After dinner, fix yourself a much-deserved drink at the wet bar and lay back in a sun lounger as the sun sets. Inside, the soothing whites, warm wood toned furnishings, and the clutter-free environment will surely put the group in a relaxed state of mind. Pick up some fresh Mahi-mahi from a local market and let your inner chef run free with inspiration from the villa’s state of the art kitchen. Sip your morning Nespresso by the pool or stretch out inside and watch the Smart TV while you bask in the air conditioning. And, don’t be afraid to invite new friends over, there’s garage parking for 2 within this gated-property. Now is the time to finally try surfing; Sunshine Beach has ideal conditions and plenty of banks, so surf spots don’t get too crowded. After a lesson, head to the Surf Club for lunch, maybe a beer, and dine with your feet in the sand. Keep exploring the Sunshine Coast, and you’ll find countless beaches leading down to Brisbane, which is just over an hour’s drive. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb luxury home is situated within Champion Ridge, a gated golf community at Mauna Lani Resort on Hawaii's Big Island. With sweeping views of the golf course, Pacific Ocean, and Kohala Mountains, the villa offers an enchanting sanctuary within minutes of some of the finest fairways, spa facilities, and beaches in Hawaii. The house balances vintage island elegance with high-end amenities for relaxation and dining, including a private swimming pool, hot tub, and gourmet kitchen. Three bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms, plus a sofa bed in the den, accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eight in size.The elegant pool extends the entire width of the house, hugging the shapely terrace and inviting you into its refreshing waters. The hot tub is secluded to the side of the house, ideal for soothing soaks under the sun or stars. The cool and spacious lanai features a high-end barbecue grill serving a lovely dining table, while the comfortable lounge enjoys panoramic views of the sunset.The villa's living room features high, vaulted ceilings and a wide threshold opening to the lanai, allowing the home to breathe the sea-kissed air. The open-concept space includes a comfortable TV lounge and a superb dining table for ten. The kitchen will inspire the contemporary cook, with high-grade appliances, generous prep space, and wide doors to the alfresco dining area. A separate media room welcomes afternoon downtime or late-night movies, while the home office provides an inspiring retreat for students or business travelers.The bedrooms offer dreamy havens for private relaxation and rest, furnished in a timeless Hawaiian style. All three suites open to the lanai, and each features an ensuite bathroom. Throughout the home, vaulted ceilings and beautiful wood accents cast a soothing, natural ambiance amid the lush, sun-kissed landscape of the resort.Mauna Lani Beach Club is just over a mile from the villa, featuring a swimming pool, hot tub, clubhouse, and watersports equipment. The spa and fitness facilities at Mauna Lani Resort are about five minutes away, and you're less than a mile from world-class golf at Francis H. I'i Brown South Course. The 23.5-acre Champion Ridge community features private gardens and Hawaii's only 18-hole putting course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let the Kohala Coast enchant you during a holiday at Ke Kailani (1C) at Mauna Lani. From its setting in an exclusive gated community at the Mauna Lani Resort, this Big Island vacation rental looks out over the golf course to the ocean and offers easy access to an oceanfront entertaining area. Reserve its three bedrooms for a Hawaiian escape with friends and family, or a tropical honeymoon.Spend lazy days under the island sunshine swimming in the villa’s private pool, relaxing in the hot tub or trying out local seafood on the barbecue. In the evenings, pour a glass from the wine fridge, flip on the smart TV or catch up with the rest of the world via Wi-Fi. For your comfort and convenience, the home has air conditioning and laundry facilities.Inside, Ke Kailani is all about relaxing across 3,000 square feet of space. A fold-away glass wall lets you open the great room of this luxury property to the outdoor living areas, while a double-height ceiling adds to the breezy feel. There’s ample seating in the living and dining areas, plus a breakfast bar along the granite countertop in the fully equipped kitchen.The villa has two bedrooms in its main house: one with a California king bed and one with a king bed. The third bedroom is in a guest house and has a queen bed. All three bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms and open to a balcony or terrace.Guests of Ke Kailani are welcome to use the community’s shared beach club, and can play on the Mauna Lani tennis courts or golf course at extra cost. The villa is also a 10-minute drive from popular Hapuna Beach and a short drive from a second golf course. If you’d like more shopping and dining options, drive to Waimea or take a day trip to downtown Kona.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-935-725-3376-01
